description: React component for displaying a live activity feed that subscribes to real-time activity updates via WebSocket, loads initial data from an API, and manages bursty incoming events with debounce buffering.

methods.name: LiveActivityFeed()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a real-time activity feed with initial load and live updates.

methods.name: loadInitial
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch initial activity data from the API endpoints.

methods.name: flushBuffer
methods.description: Debounces and merges incoming activity events into the displayed list.

methods.name: enqueueEvent
methods.description: Adds new activity event payloads to buffer and triggers debounce flush.
